channel.title: Projects on Isaac Changhau
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Isaac Changhau

item.title: PrimeNet: Human-inspired Framework for Commonsense Knowledge Representation and Reasoning
item.description: A human-inspired framework for commonsense knowledge representation and reasoning.

item.title: Behavioural Understanding and Narrative Descriptions from Videos
item.description: An effectively and flexibly multimodal system to analyze and narrate real world events captured in video.

item.title: Neural Sequence Labeling
item.description: An unified and accurate deep learning based approach for various sequence labeling tasks such as POS, Chunking, NER, SRL, Punctuation Restoration and etc.

item.title: Removing Backscatter to Enhance the Visibility of Underwater Object
item.description: A novel and effective method based on underwater optical model for underwater object visibility enhancement.

item.title: Image Enhancement based on Retinex Theory and Dual-tree Complex Wavelet Transform
item.description: An improved and effective method for image enhancement based on retinex theory and dual-tree complex wavelet transform techniques.
